identified-content.org: National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame (Saratoga Springs, Ny)

abstract.p: Photos of 50th anniversary benefit at National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame in Saratoga Springs, NY

block.p: The National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame in Saratoga Springs, N.Y., celebrated its 50th anniversary at its annual benefit on Aug. 11. A highlight was the exhibition of race paintings by the great British equestrian artist Sir Alfred Munnings (1878-1959). Even if the tradition of private horse-owning and breeding families is giving way to syndicates, the glamour of Saratoga lingers, with Marylou Whitney and Mollie Wilmot assiduously fanning the flames.

The National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame in Saratoga Springs, N.Y., celebrated its 50th anniversary at its annual benefit on Aug. 11. A highlight was the exhibition of race paintings by the great British equestrian artist Sir Alfred Munnings (1878-1959). Even if the tradition of private horse-owning and breeding families is giving way to syndicates, the glamour of Saratoga lingers, with Marylou Whitney and Mollie Wilmot assiduously fanning the flames.
